meta.description: Optimize the number of trips by two shipping companies to minimize diesel usage while delivering gifts.

sets.name: COMPANIES
sets.description: The two shipping companies: new and old.

params.name: gifts_per_trip
params.description: Number of gifts each company can deliver per trip.

params.name: diesel_per_trip
params.description: Liters of diesel used per trip by each company.

params.name: min_gifts
params.description: Minimum number of gifts that need to be delivered.

params.name: max_trips_new
params.description: Maximum number of trips that can be made by the new company.

vars.name: trips
vars.description: Number of trips made by each company.

objective.name: min_total_diesel
objective.description: Minimize the total diesel used by both companies.

constraints.name: min_gifts_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure at least 1000 gifts are delivered.

constraints.name: max_trips_new_constraint
constraints.description: Limit the number of trips by the new company to at most 15.

constraints.name: min_trips_old_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure at least 40% of all trips are made by the old company.
